author: Andreas
content:
Brahms. Hmm ... one of the dark places on my map. On my journey through the history of music I have omitted Brahms mostly. Can't say why. The German Requiem is probably the only Brahms I have.

Anyway. Tapping into the matrix I immediately found op. 49, the Lullaby ðŸ™‚ Well, guess more that than the Requiem, right :-?
